name: 2d shooter (tavisal)
description:
This is my 2D shooter project

Modifications 

. 1) I added a different main menu screen with different music  and changed the name of the game.

2) I added Level text at the beginning of each level saying the level number and with and audio that says round 1 fight o e.g ''Round 2 '' fight

3) I added a win screen when you complete all the levels 

After finishing my game press alt + esc
